description: This file provides React hooks for managing WebSocket connections with fallback to polling. It includes useWebSocket for real-time communication via WebSocket and usePolling for periodic polling, facilitating real-time features in the front-end of a web application.

methods.name: useWebSocket(path = '', { onMessage, onOpen, onClose, protocols } = {})
methods.description: Custom React hook to establish and manage a WebSocket connection, providing state indicators and message handling.

methods.name: usePolling(callback, intervalMs, { enabled = true } = {})
methods.description: Custom React hook to perform periodic polling by repeatedly executing a callback at specified intervals.
